title: Got a 14 day ban :( need help
body: i got a 14 day ban for saying 2 bad words i am never toxic and have never had a 14 day ban before i see this a bit unfair seeing AZ now i wont get my rewards i think maybe a chat restriction first might have been better i have played this game for a long long time and this season i got my highest rank i have ever been but now its all worth nothing coz i said 2 bad words i am always a good person to play with and i think this is unfair if anyone know will i at-least get my border ??

replies.body: Post the full chat log let us see the "**only 2 words**" ðŸ‘€

Hey MonstÃªr, 
[
Unfortunately your ban will render you ineligible for *all* rewards this season.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility) 

You can always appeal your ban through [Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), although it will not be removed and your rewards re-instated unless your ban was in error.
